name: Smith Attack MAG MTB Sunglasses - Unisex
description: Having the right lens can make all the difference. Whether you’re beating the sun to the trailhead, or squeezing in a few afterwork laps, the Attack MAG’s interchangeable lens system gives you options for bright sun or low-light. Both lenses feature Smith’s ChromaPop™ technology for increased contrast, so you won’t miss a thing as you drop into that gnarly rock garden.Designed for medium to large faces.MAG™ lens change system uses the power of magnets for quick and easy lens changes.ChromaPop lenses deliver exceptional clarity, high contrast, and dynamic colour optimization, making them great for challenging light conditions.Thin temples tuck easily under helmets.2-position nose pads fit a variety of nose bridges.Hydrophilic megol nose pads and temple tips keep the glasses in place when things get wet.Hydroleophobic lens coating helps protect the lenses from smudges/droplets and repels water, making them easier to clean.7x4 toric lens curvature reduces distortion and offers excellent coverage.TR90 frames are light, strong and flexible.Includes a zippered hard-case and an additional ChromaPop Low Light Amber lens with 65% visible light transmission.
